trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around June 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking down street In Kokomo 2 blocks from my house. Seen what looked like a star ..Stationary. I dismised for a second till I seen vertical, horizontal movement. I never believed things to much like this but last night... OK. The movement was so intricate and seeming impossible for any type of aircraft I know of. Lasted not more than 3 min... exact time.. was 159am.. til 202 aproximate.. The starlike object vanished after.
Summary: Walking down the street. I seen what I thought was a star then impossible movement.
